title: SB 1186
content:
The people of the State of California enact the following. Appropriation of $647,443.32 from specified funds to California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for payment of accepted claims. Payment schedule includes $606,296.25 from General Fund. The California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board will pay accepted claims according to the following schedule:
- General Fund: $606,296.25
- Program 1835010: $47.31
- Program 2130: $966.22
- Program 3960022: $2,028.06
- Program 4275010: $15,567.57
- Program 4275010: $15,567.57 Total for Fund: Item 2740-001-0044 Budget Act of 2016, Program 2130 - $966.22
Total for Fund: Item 4260-101-0001 Budget Act of 2016, Program 3960022 - $2,028.06
Total for Fund: Item 5180-111-0001 Budget Act of 2016, Program 4275010 - $15,567.57
Total for Fund: Item 7100-001-0185 Budget Act of 2016, Program 5930 - $22,537.91 The Controller shall transfer surcharges and fees from specified Budget Act items to a designated fund as requested by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The transferred amount for each item shall not exceed the total per claim filing fee and surcharge authorized by the Government Code. The Controller shall transfer surcharges and fees from specified Budget Act items to a designated fund as requested by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board, not exceeding the total per claim filing fee and surcharge authorized by the Government Code. This amount shall be transferred for the support of board reimbursements. The Controller will transfer an amount not exceeding the total per claim filing fee and surcharge authorized by the Government Code to support board reimbursements. The board must report the recovered amounts to the Department of Finance within 90 days of the enactment of this act. The General Fund appropriates $581,600 to pay Obie Steven Anthony III's claim and $653,600 to pay John Smith's claim through the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The General Fund appropriates $653,600 to pay John Smith's claim and $564,100 to pay Michael Smith's claim through the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The General Fund appropriates $564,100 to pay Michael Smith's claim and $512,600 to pay Timothy Gantt's claim through the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The General Fund appropriates $512,600 for Timothy Gantt's claim and $654,500 for Marco Milla's claim through the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The General Fund appropriates $762,440 for Larry Pohlschneider's claim through the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The General Fund appropriates $762,440 to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for Larry Pohlschneider's claim. Additionally, $936,880 is appropriated for Luther Ed Jones, Jr.'s claim. The General Fund appropriates $936,880 to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for Luther Ed Jones, Jr.'s claim. This act is an urgency statute for the immediate preservation of public peace, health, or safety. SEC. 10. This act is an urgency statute necessary for the immediate preservation of public peace, health, or safety to pay claims against the state quickly and end hardship for claimants.
